website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost option that doesn't require a contract, nor do you need a monitoring company if you just want simple alerts.
pros: You can choose from a 5- to 15-piece kit depending on your needs
Professional monitoring service for a low monthly fee
Sends alerts to your phone and is compatible with Alexa
cons: Installation system for window monitors is too big for some windows

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Gen why not
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup as I went from Simplisafe. I went from $25 a month to $10 which is a huge savings. Easy to install, looks fresh, and excited to complete the set(Floodlights next).
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Allman

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Install is Easy. Devices are sleek and responsive
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Super easy install and configuration. So happy to get rid of ADT and paying only a fraction of the cost for professional monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: A O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product still needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system, my only complaint is the contact sensors are too wide and I feel like the app software could use some further fine tuning
customer_reviews.author: Demarco Quant

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.....
customer_reviews.text: Alarm product works great on iPhone and was very easy to set up. Very happy with this. Waiting on remote fobs and glass break monitors.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Defective Base Station Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Brand new Gen2 base station powers on but wifi connection doesn’t work. Now I am left with a very expensive paper weight :( Edit: pulled out the rechargeable battery, now it works. Stress and weird. Connected without issues after
customer_reviews.author: Santi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Received my ring yesterday. Installed this morning but window/Door sensor had 0 stick on the back of them. Called the 1800 number, and was told to go buy some tape. That might sound like an easy solution. But after spending more then $200 I'll rather buy a system that truly comes ready out of the box. Will be returning. Great idea but bad execution.
customer_reviews.author: Tez

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Siren is not loud. Door sensor came with half battery. System appear to be repacked and bought it new I reluctantly installed it. The interface app works great but this is a review of gen 2 system to which I have to say is over priced cheaply made and siren is basically useless. Maybe I got a bad one but I compared with someone else who tried they said same.....
customer_reviews.author: Jampot

customer_reviews.title: Great system but info confusion
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy set up and control everything with your phone and alexa. What I didn't like is that when it was advertised it says generation 2. I thought that it was ring doorbell 2 but it was ring doorbell version 2 where the battery cannot be removed to be charged. So I have to remove the complete camera down to charge it. Which is frustrating so I had to purchase an adapter which made me have to pay more money on the system.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This has been a constant problem
customer_reviews.text: I got this installed and worked fine for about 5 hours and then the base would not connect. I called their service number and after two hang ups I finally go someone, but they only got it working for a brief period. Called again and they go the base to connect for almost a full 24 hours before it started sending me error messages that it was not connecting. Who has hours each day to spend on the phone with Ring customer service?
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Worst home security system I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 1star because while it was easy to install, this system has been a nightmare for the few weeks I have had it set up and I would 100% return it if the return window hasn't closed. I'm not kidding that I have spent over 3 hours with tech support for sensors not working, for batteries going dead(in less than 2 months) for things not syncing(in a 900 sq ft, one level house) its bananas. The cheap service plan is not worth it to me. Please don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Alex and Elise

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a cost effective way to monitor their home. The ability to self monitor my home was a plus for me. But also the fact that professional monitoring is only ten a month is AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: Jatrien

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap. Nothing works out of the box. The base station goes into updating and never gets out. Searching find many customers with same issue Tech support is hours behind. Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: sELWYN dICKEY

customer_reviews.title: Unit was clearly used and advertised as new
customer_reviews.text: The unit was NOT NEW. The packaging stickers were broken and the unit had scratches all over it. Requested a new unit be sent. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love/Hate
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is great but I’m frustrated because I bought the set since it included house alarm and ring doorbell. The shipment was split into two and the ring doorbell was damaged and returned to the facility with comments that I will be reimbursed. I haven’t yet received a refund or have I got a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible company / staff
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my 1st Ring device in Sept 2019, I selected their product after a lengthy comparison and they had the longest FREE time to review video clips. Now that I’ve had the product for over a year and purchased several more items from them, they altered the terms, and you must have a subscription to view anything but live video.
customer_reviews.author: Arcanus

customer_reviews.title: Great integration with Alexa, New sensors and keypad are better
customer_reviews.text: Works rather nicely. Integrates with Alexa much better than other leading more expensive competitors. Not going back to any other provider. The newer version sensors are smaller and I've heard does not work with all doors and windows. But they worked with mine so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: ADT may provide equipment but the monthly is triple
customer_reviews.text: Great value, easy set up ADT your days are numbered My girlfriend needed monitoring to qualify for the rate she was quoted on her new house (poor practice). $60 monthly with ADT wiped that out anyway. We tried the Ring system and love it! $10 monthly monitor (nice) and it's not necessary to run the system! She has to pay a monitor fee for her insurance rate but you can run the Ring yourself no charge send alerts to your smartphone
customer_reviews.author: mike s

customer_reviews.title: Great monitoring, poor keypad interface
customer_reviews.text: System looks great, price of the equipment is fair and the monitoring is amazing. Downsides- I’ve had issues with a sensor where it set the alarm off a couple of times even though the door was not opened and it was installed properly. Support has me remove it and re-add and I’m hoping it doesn’t happen again. As far as the interface, minor complaints- I don’t like that the keypad makes you enter the pin before arming, and have to press an additional button after entering the pin to disarm. This unintuitive interface has caused my guests and family members confusion and resulted in false alarms. App controls are excellent
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Kelly Walters

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended when with easy install.
customer_reviews.text: The phone app that has to be used WITH your system is not very good... very buggy and has very delayed notice to your phone of events picked up by your video doorbell. Even though my system is professionally monitored the app tells me it isn't. Also, the app doesn't pick up and record the video like it should. Take that into consideration when buying this system. There are a lot of reviews about about the app. The system is only a good a the app. It was easy to set up and install. The siren is NOT loud. Your neighbor will not hear it so it is not a deterrent. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TDoz

customer_reviews.title: Tamper alerts nonstop
customer_reviews.text: I want to rate this a 5 because it is nice looking and pretty easy to install but it’s been nothing but a headache. The issue has been the sensors on my 2 most used doors. They both have temper alerts nonstop. I have reset them a few times and even bought 2 new sensors that worked for a few weeks and then tamper alerts all over again. No one needs to wake up in the middle of the night nonstop due to an alert. It’s too late to return it and no matter how many sensors I replace or how I position them it seems to keep happening. Not a very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had no idea a security system could be so easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I really expected a security system to be a hassle, but Ring made this super easy to set up. Once I set up the hub, it was expecting the sensor that came with the kit, so it immediately found and paired those devices as soon as I took them out of the box and pulled the battery tab. I can set up alerts/phone notifications to get just enough information without be overloaded. Additionally, because all the sensors work well with Alexa, it's easy to set up routines based on motion to control any other devices. For instance, I can turn on lights as I open doors to enter the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jake W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Alarm System
customer_reviews.text: Love this whole system. Installation and set up are super easy. Absolutely love the app and all the different customization options. Some things I hope they will add: 1. I wish it had the ability to set up sensors on a schedule. Would be nice for it to arm/disarm automatically at set times in case you forget 2. Hope they will make Glass break sensor
customer_reviews.author: ReRe

customer_reviews.title: Best security system ever!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my SimpliSafe system with the Ring 2nd gen security system. Primarily because of monthly cost. It's hard to beat $100 bucks a year for monitoring with as many cams as you want. It was easy to install and setup. Works flawlessly with the ring app. I also have the spotlight cam, battery cam, and doorbell 2nd gen hooked up to the system. This is literally the best system with thr latest tech you can get for the price. I don't see how any other security company can even compete with ring. It's great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but base station broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The system is easy to setup as all the sensors and accessories are already pre-paired to the base station. However, I knew something was wrong when my base station took longer than normal to boot up. I soon found out that the LED ring was broken and the siren didnt work. The rep at Ring support was very professional and shipped me a replacement base station along with a return label, all of which arrived within 2 days. The really annoying part is there was no way to add a base station to my home. I ended up having to re-pair all my sensors to the replacement base station.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Basically perfect, and very easy install
customer_reviews.text: Basically perfect. User interface and iPhone: The iPhone app works perfectly and is easy to understand. It offers lots of control over the behavior of individual sensors in the various modes. Install and Range: With the included range extender, I have signal coverage across all three floors of my home (built into a hillside). Install was very easy. The only issue I had was that some sensors were not discovered until after the unit rebooted and updated itself (this process was not obvious). Sensors: I love the flexibility to mix and match motion detectors, door sensors, cameras, keypads, etc.
customer_reviews.author: CAAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I like the system so far. The only thing I didn’t like that you can have free Alexa with the purchase of 14 piece bundle, but you can’t have the echo show 5 with it. Once you choose echo show 5, it takes you automatic to the 8 piece bundle.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great system but has its flaws if you do not have monitering
customer_reviews.text: I really like this system. The range is fantastic, motion sensing is great. Ive combined it with flodo lights, sppot lights, solar lights etc. Only issue is overnight I have to turn the chirps on and the volume up on the base station to hear chimes as that is when we need the alarm system active. And then every morning I have to go into the app to turn off all the chirps and the volume on the base station or it will just be chirping at us all day from the motion sensors. Its really frustrating and makes it hard to love what would be a near perfect system
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Affordable security system
customer_reviews.text: I recently installed this item at my newly purchased house and it works just great. I' m currently using the free trial and plan on signing up for the premium protection subscription plan after the trial ends. The contact sensors response time, and Alexa integration are just amazing. However, I did find that the motion sensor is not very responsive. It only detected motion in close proximity. I tried "Test Motion" feature by placing the motion sensor at different locations to see if it detects motion, and every single time it only detected motion when I was really close to the sensor. Except for the motion sensor, everything else works great.
customer_reviews.author: K.REDD

customer_reviews.title: How does this have so many good reviews?
customer_reviews.text: This system is a pain! Devices constantly disconnect, extender has to be in the same room to connect to the base station, door sensors stopped working entirely (barely 6 weeks old) I cannot recommend this product. The chat support cannot help with returning or swapping out defective products.
customer_reviews.author: H&C Wilson

customer_reviews.title: No mounting screw.  Base station issues.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to install the product with no mounting screws. When i press the pair button, the unit will not allow me to find my base station. Now i'm on Hold with Ring trying to fix the issue. Mind you, i just unbox the unit.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Best DIY Alarm On The Market
customer_reviews.text: After paying ridiculous amounts of money each month for the big name security systems for years, I have been looking for a system that has all the features but is significantly cheaper. I narrowed it down between the Ring and SimplySafe systems. I chose to go with the Ring due to it being $15 cheaper a month and I'm glad I did. So far it has worked great to provide us with peace of mind, and everything we need was included in the kit. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: connection time to Ring is too long
customer_reviews.text: This is likely an internet issue but frustrating if I can't pull it up on my phone or echo immediately which is what drew me to this device. I can walk to the door faster than pulling it up on my phone or echo device and that is why I gave it a 4 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: After a recent string of break-in attempts in our neighborhood, we decided to get this system at a friend's recommendation. I'm so glad we did. It was super easy to install and set up. I love that the whole system is linked in an app- so I can turn it on/off from upstairs as needed. Every piece came with a sticky back, so no screws were needed to install. We plan to get more of the sensors that go on doors/windows just for added piece of mind. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from PPA and haven’t been able to sleep since my babies were born in fear that someone will break into their rooms/the house and take them. I bought this because it was on sale and had a good bundle deal. The first night after I set this up, I slept more soundly than I had slept in a very long time. It’s such an easy set up for everything and it makes my home feel so secure. Worth the money for my kids safety and my peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Thankfully we have not had to “use” the system yet. Set up was SO simple. The manual and app walk you right through it. Tech support is awesome, knowledgeable, and very friendly. I had some questions with my alarm permit for my county and they took care of everything promptly and made sure all of my questions were correctly answered. The price is right; you can’t beat it. I also like how it integrates with other Ring products, and how you can arm it from your phone. I like that you can turn off the door open/close sound as well. Overall, I’m really happy with this purchase and am glad I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kleiman

customer_reviews.title: Contact sensors aren’t designed well!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great and setup was easy but I have a real problem with the contact sensors. They are difficult to install on doors that aren’t perfectly flush with the doorframe. Also, the sticky stuff pulls the paint off if you have to adjust the placement of sensors (you will have to adjust at least some of them!). I feel like I wasted a bundle on the contact sensors as I can’t use most of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. A must, if you want to be safe
customer_reviews.text: We never used any screws to install this 14 piece security system. installing the first contact sensor took around 15 minutes. But, after that, it took just 2 minutes for all sensors to install. The keypad, we did not install it. It just stays in our desk. Also, we have used this for the past 2 months and the battery power on these is almost the same as they were new. We could control, monitor, and ARM/Disarm right from our cell phone app. Actually, we don't need the keypads, because, we could do all functionalities and even more with the cell phone app. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thampi

customer_reviews.title: Get It!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, the app is pretty simple, easy to navigate once you go thru it a few times... the base station glow is pretty cool, the price of the monitoring is unheard of!!!! (pleeeese don't go up in a year or two.) And ALL the cool things you can do with Alexa integration. arm - disarm by voice, guard and arm simultaneously, announce what's open, trigger routines, I'm still finding things I can do with Alexa. If I need to expand the price won't kill me :) teaching the family how to use it was easy peesey. each having there own code is a plus something they can easy remember. Yes I would Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl G

customer_reviews.title: Ring Alarm
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I was worried about getting this alarm and not having a “professional” installation. Let me tell you, this is AMAZING!!! I would recommend this for any family! I would recommend getting the 8 piece set, FYI The alarm “going off” is super loud! And the price for monitoring is a lot cheaper than any other company without a contract! It is super easy to install and the directions really helped! Additional bonus...this alarm goes with us when we move! SUPER SATISFIED! Thanks Ring!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so HAPPY with our Ring purchase! We are not the techies that some people are and it only took us 45 minutes to install the system. We have had. Zero problems so far. Had it about twoonths now. Have recommended it to our friends and have had one order it through us of course. Actually installed it for them this past weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Clean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The system is really easy to install. The sensors are already registered with the base station so you just need to stick them where you need to and you’re good to go. Make sure you are sticking them at the right place, You can’t reposition then and they won’t stick again with the same strips. The monitoring is really good. I only have one issue: the door sensor thought it was tampered while nobody was gone and the system armed, so the alarm when off for no reason. But having the camera definitely helps to make sure it’s a false alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: really really great
customer_reviews.text: We were on the fence between Ring and Vivant / ADT type company. Ring was the most honest and straight up. To go with Vivant you actually have to take out a 5 year loan in your name to be able to use the equipment. Of course the dude on the phone doesn't tell us any of that. We almost blew a ton of money and took a shot to our credit scores for Vivant. And then we decided ring might be the way to go and we've been so happy since then. It's exactly what we wanted and not too hard at all to install.
customer_reviews.author: Branson C.

customer_reviews.title: Ring Offered Savings and Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Cox Homelife security monitoring system with the Ring (2d Gen) to save on cost and flexibility with my smart home devices. I was paying almost $60 per month for Cox Homelife smart home features and monitoring service and did not have the option to integrate with Smartthings Hub or Alexa. The Ring alarm install and setup were straightforward. I am very satisfied so far, although it's still in the trial period, and there haven't been any incidents to date requiring emergency dispatch.
customer_reviews.author: WSG

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Alarm System
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing and very easy to set up right out the box! I already have ring cameras around my house and the alarm system is just like the icing on the cake! Everything was already paired and just had to set it up where I wanted. The base is loud and the sensors work great! Glad I bought this product with every single penny! Paying $100 a year por professional motoring is amazing better then what you would pay with other companies. Overall, I would recommend this product if your thinking about getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. We went with the ring system as we have the doorbell camera and other ring security cameras as well. Cloud storage and alarm monitoring for $100 a year! Can’t beat that. The bonus echo show 5 sounds, looks and works well. It’s just a little slow at showing you the doorbell camera when someone rings it. Otherwise everything is great
customer_reviews.author: Mike mai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, even easier to use
customer_reviews.text: Swapped out a local alarm company monitored alarm for this one. Installed keypad, motion sensor, 3 door contacts, base station and WiFi extender in less than an hour. Easy of use is fantastic. System is easy to install and even easier to use. Integrates easily with ring cameras. For $100 annually o get cloud storage for 2 cameras and annual monitoring. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY Security System
customer_reviews.text: The RING system is great. It is offered at a reasonable price and offers flexibility and future expansion by adding extra components as needed. The 24 hour monitoring is offered at a great price which even includes a cellular backup that keeps you protected even if you lose your internet connection. AND it also includes a battery backup so if the power goes out you are still protected by batteries and cellular connection! I have already added outdoor floodlights and a few other options and I really love this system. Easy to install and use!!! Definitely 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great best purchased decision made
customer_reviews.text: So far I really love the ring security system. It works as expected. The only think I was frustrated with was figuring out how to install window and door sensors. Really not all windows are made equal. I understand they had redesigned the sensors to make it work. I eventually placed them on not as designed but however it would fit the windows or doors to work effectively. Overall good purchase, the indoor camera works great too real live videos and no delay unlike arlo.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: At Ease Soldier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the sole purpose of having an alarm go off if someone opens a window or kicks open a door at night. I feared being in a deep sleep and not waking up in time. The alarm will make your ears ring if you're too close to it when it goes off. The entire thing took me 40 minutes to set up and learn to use. Amazing bang for your buck, especially since you can't put a price of feeling more secured in your home.
customer_reviews.author: La JECS

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre...
customer_reviews.text: It's not what I'm looking for. I need a more permanent solution. This system is OK for Self installation but I don't like all the cords and wires hanging out and the camera often malfunctions
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Big upgrade and money saver too
customer_reviews.text: I was paying $200+/year to the local alarm monitoring company. This did not include any mobile phone integration or remote alarm monitoring. With Ring I get all those extra features, mobile alerts, ability to arm/disarm remotely, all for a much lower price. I didn't have to spend that extra low price since I have 3 Ring cameras around the house and the Alarm price is included in what I am already paying for the cameras' cloud storage. Overall, it made economical sense to switch to Ring and I am enjoying the convenience of app-based monitoring and alerts.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Aravindakshan

customer_reviews.title: Simple install, cheap peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very simple. I've never had a security system, so I can't compare it to anything. I do however, feel like this will work just fine for what I need. I've got the ring doorbell, and now with this security system I feel a little more at peace when I have to be away from my family for work. I paid for the year, so its only $8.33 a month. I'm pretty happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Joey and Murdoch

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several alarms and several monitored services...Ring is the best by far! Very easy set-up and integrates fully with my other systems, including Amazon echo. Installation only took about 45 minutes for 6 door/window sensors, 5 cameras, 2 outdoor spotlights, keypad and 8 indoor light bulbs. Very easy, quick set-up and everything works great...even the solar powered outdoor cameras and lights! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Donn Gueniot

customer_reviews.title: Cancel your current alarm provider
customer_reviews.text: I have been living in my house for 3.5 years and I've had the ADT alarm system paying $45 a month oh what a waste of money. I can get fully protected with monitoring with Ring with all my other ring devices for $100 a year. I can't believe I wasted so much money with ADT. The set up is so easy just download the Ring app and it will walk you through the whole set up.
customer_reviews.author: KEISHA RICHBURG

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I did a bunch of research before purchasing the Ring system. I couldn't be happier with my decision. The system has performed flawlessly in the 4 weeks I've had it installed. I love all the app features and how easy it was to install. We also integrated a ring doorbell and 2 exterior cameras with the system, and everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: jovial

customer_reviews.title: I love the price of the monitoring - $10 a month
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my DIY Honeywell Lynx system with Ring because with Ring you can have self-service monitoring (email and app push notifications) for free. But with the monitoring price of $10, I decided to get the professional monitoring service. It was very easy to set up, which I expected. Alexa integration is great, which I also expected. At first, I bought a WiFi smart lock, and then I realized that I needed to have a ZWave lock if I wanted to be able to arm and disarm Ring from the lock keypad (at the same time as locking and unlocking the door). I am very happy so far with the convenience, design, and value.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ring Alarm is so easy to setup. I bought what Amazon sold as a 14 item kit and got everything setup in just a few minutes. Each sensor added without problem and reports it's status instantly. The subscription service is also so much cheaper than the traditional alarm companies. One of the best parts is being able to arm my home via the app, Alexa, or keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Erickarlo Porro

customer_reviews.title: Very Good System - Expected better integration with Alex.
customer_reviews.text: Disregarding my expectations for Alexa integration, this is a great system. Easy to install and use. For that 5 stars. But since Ring is owned by Amazon, I expected more from the Alexa integration. I believe the limitations are intentional as no not in any way decrease the sale of their monitoring service or other devices. For example, you can't ask Alexa to trigger an alarm or make an announcement about an alarm. But I'm Happy with the system.
customer_reviews.author: wmstram

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this system
customer_reviews.text: We moved into our new house in a different city not too far from where we used to live, and we were worried about package theft, car prowlers, etc. Since we've been in our new home about a month, this security system along with the door bell and flood lights have been awesome to have. I love the notifications, being able to snooze notifications, etc. The app is great at explaining how to install the security system along with other products with their helpful videos and step by step process.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gacrama

customer_reviews.title: Unstable with poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: The system is very unstable and the battery life on the contact sensors is awful. Range extenders don't extend the range of a ring alarm at all. With the range extender installed within 2 feet of a contact sensor, the sensor still gets a poor connection signal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monthly Professional monitoring by Ring is definitely cheaper than ADT
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and start self monitoring. Wish it had window break sensor but other than that really like it. I also like the “neighbors” feature in the app. It’s like a neighborhood watch without having to go to a meeting. When you add cameras and other bells and whistles, it’s pretty expensive but how much is a little sense of security worth! I also think alarm sound level should be louder. Overall it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Must have home security!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new security system!! Have been a 12 year customer of ADT and just switched and there is not one thing I miss! The cost alone of monthly monitoring is so much more reasonable. The software, setup and management of everything is so easy and it integrates with my alexa devices which is convenient and cool at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin C

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better than ADT
customer_reviews.text: I pretty enjoy using the ring kit. I was a customer of ADT. The monthly fee went up dramatically when the contract ends. The ring kit has self-monitor mode which is totally free. I also set it up with my homebridge. Now it can work with the Apple HomeKit! That’s all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Nico W

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Much easier to set up than I thought it would be. I do wish we could use custom sounds for the alerts since the its doesn't have the "front door open" or "garage door open" type of announcement. Also wish we could be able to set a specific time everyday for the alarm to set by itself. But overall no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: UncleLu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: This system was very easy to install and very cost effective.The monitoring service is a fifth of what the system it replaced cost and will pay for itself in 6 months. Pairs well with my iPhone and Alexa. Support is also very responsive. A problem with one sensor was quickly diagnosed and taken care of,
customer_reviews.author: J. Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Best value and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: I did research and watched tons of videos before deciding on this system. I am very happy with my choice. I t works very well and I use the extra sensors for activating entry lighting with Alexa routines.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not allowed to have more than one contact sensor
customer_reviews.text: Ring and Amazon are blocking the purchase of more than one contact sensor. Definitely useless in this case - any house needs more than one such sensor. Wasted money and time with such kindergarten toy - not a professional solution. Smoke in mirror. Do not use Ring. This is a real scam.
customer_reviews.author: MFT2015

customer_reviews.title: For DYI, it is tops
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the most simplistic electronics I have ever installed. It simply works. I really enjoy the amount of customization allowed by their app, which by the way is excellent. The only comment I would add is it is too informative, I receive alerts even when put on disarm mode. However, that does not detract from the ease of installation, intuitive nature of the app and the fact you can use it without the call center just fine. I did not include a rating for the tech support as I have not had to use them. The system, instructions and installation are all very easy to follow and use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A

customer_reviews.title: Great security and clear cameras.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm system is extremely easy to install and very effective in protecting my home. I highly recommend using ring to protect your him.
customer_reviews.author: James Horsley

customer_reviews.title: follow instructions, only activate one device at a time
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, if you follow instructions, easy to install, easy to set up in app and with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Theriot

customer_reviews.title: Very nice system
customer_reviews.text: A great alarm system, very easy to set up, no cheap components, no complaints so far, I suggest Ring should include an external siren of their own, I bought the Dome siren, is working ok, but I have my doubts about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Great system, easy install, ease of mind home is protected.
customer_reviews.text: Gave the motion detection 3 stars, as I have it on the lowest setting, and it still picks up my kitten and sets off the alarms in the house. It sits in the corner of our entryway, a 4x8 room, up at the ceiling, and if she walks into that room, it triggers the alarm. Outside of that, great system. Works smooth, easy setup and integration with Alexa. Extremely happy with it, and have been recommending to everyone I talk to.
customer_reviews.author: Mack7n

customer_reviews.title: Only issue is batteries
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit, but the only issue I’ve had is with the batteries in the contact sensor. We got this in April and it’s now August, we have had to replace the batteries once in July and today we got a notification that the contact sensor is offline cause it’s dead AGAIN. I’m not sure why it is draining so fast but buyer beware: get extra batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Love my ring system.
customer_reviews.text: Did not purchase product via Amazon but still want to write a review. System relatively easy to set up. Had alarm go off this morning and nearly immediately got a call from Ring wanting to know if everything was alright. (It was). I already had a couple of other products so was paying the $100 per year annual fee so the additional monitoring costs me basically nothing. Ring has made a number of enhancements over the last several months which make products even more desirable. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Heilman

customer_reviews.title: Way Better Than SimpliSafe - Cheaper & Easier To Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Had bought SimpliSafe prior to Ring, only to find out Simplisafe makes you pay $24 a month if you want to use their smartphone app. If you don't pay, you can't access SimpliSafe on your phone so you can self-monitor. Sent Simplisafe back and got Ring. It is way better and easier to use. Monitoring only costs $10 a month.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoBulls64

customer_reviews.title: Contact sensor having critical issues after just 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with the product for the first month then about the second month we hanged the contact sensors battery 2 times and it lasted about 2 days and died again... basically making the system pointless without a key component working I will try and contact their customer support if I can find it and follow up with how they handle this... considering I planned on expanding exponentially I have my doubts now we will see
customer_reviews.author: Patrick hunter

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - DOES NOT HAVE OPTION TO AUTOMATICALLY DISARM
customer_reviews.text: If you're considering a Ring, and especially if you have used other alarm systems - BEWARE. This system does not let you set rules to disarm automatically. It's easy to set up, at a great price point, etc. But when I went to do the final steps, I got stuck b/c I know I won't remember to disarm every morning. An automatic setting like this shouldn't be missing, especially from a customer-obsessed company like Amazon. Now I've got the whole system set up, and can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: bstone

customer_reviews.title: Great Security
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a home security system and this is one is awesome!! I have Alexa and it work wonderfully with it. You can also add pieces if needed or you want to enlarge the area once you get use to. It has 24/7 monitoring for less than a dollar a day!! The alarm is LOUD too !! Great system, great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathyle

customer_reviews.title: 2 issues
customer_reviews.text: Door sensors are great but I do wish the motion sensor could be set for people rather than any movement. My cat set it off by rolling on the ground. Which you know thats good and all but kind of crazy. Also my son was able to add himself without me beimg alerted at all. I honestly got the system because he sneaks out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contact Unit battery issue
customer_reviews.text: We installed in an apartment so distance is not an issue. BUT the battery in both the door contact unit and window contact unit will last only one week. Getting help from customer service is futile. One star👎...
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, after I figured out what I was doing the set up was pretty easy. It’s easier to download the app before you begin to set up the alarm system. It took about an hour or so to set up and everything and figure out how to use everything. It’s worth doing yourself instead paying the $100 to have a tech come and do it.
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product at a Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Super easy install, the entire thing took me 1.5 hours to do. The integration was a snap and the app walks you through it all very nicely. If you pay for the entire year of monitoring up front($100) its $8.33/month for 24/7/365 professional monitoring and 60 days worth of video storage for all of you cameras. It integrates with my smart lock and Alexa with ease. I can’t say enough about how much I love the Ring system.
customer_reviews.author: TC/CC

customer_reviews.title: The best for basic security
customer_reviews.text: I love this security system. $10 a month is much better than any other security system I have researched with a call center. I accidentally set off my alarm as I was leaving so I didnt hear it, they called me just like any other service would but for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Ring light goes off all ight
customer_reviews.text: What is happening here, no motion by the thing turns on every 15 minutes. The sensor on my back door keeps coming apart and alarming. I tried taping int place and it just keeps coming apart. I paid for the monitored service and it keeps telling me "unmonitored"
customer_reviews.author: cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this DIY security system. It has a ton of features and is easy to use. I have my entire house retrofitted with ring security systems.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Compton

customer_reviews.title: Overall outstanding alarm and camera system
customer_reviews.text: Great system. Left ADT for the ring alarm and camera system. 100% better. The only complaint is the lack of battery life and short recording time for each clip. Other than that love it.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Ring Alarm paid for itself!!
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied with the Ring Alarm. We started with the Ring Flood Cam and then we bought another... and then another for full coverage surrounding our home. The next logical step was to start secure our interior. The Ring Alarm was easy to install and integrate with its other products. The quality is outstanding. We actually qualified for a homeowner's insurance discount as well. The unit paid for itself!!
customer_reviews.author: 808DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and operate
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to setup. Works really well. But if you want to cover all places you will require lot of motion detectors. The range of motion detector is too low. And there is no glass break sensor. However integration with alexa and the operational accuracy of the sensors is very good. Ring bell is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Deepblue

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: After owning for a few months, I feel like better options are out there. Price point is good but cameras are quirky. I also do not like the upswell attempts when something is not working as it should. Given the chance I would reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of security systems. This one is my first self set up. I don’t know why I haven’t tried this sooner. Easy set up and works great with Alexia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: still in the 30 day period but so far so good. Once adt is cancelled I will set up 3rd party monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Yarpezeshkan

customer_reviews.title: Still the best security alarm system!
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple security alarm systems, we still like ring the best. Whether it’s the app interface, or the ease of setup, or the customer support, everything is 10/10! This is the 3rd system we’ve purchased for 3 separate homes so far. Will never stop recommending ring to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kwok Hin Ko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: For the price I got this at it was a steal. It is very simple and quick to install everything. I believe it took me about 45 minutes to install and get everything synced. It works just as it is suppose to. I use "Alexa" for voice to turn on and off. I also can us my phone to monitor and activate when I want. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a home security system that works and won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No complaints at all
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Bought to have Alexa announce when a door is opened and say which one, my toddler likes to wake up and wander outside. Added bonus that it is also a full on security system. Siren is very loud and would act as a loud deterrent to an unmotivated criminal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. It's worth every penny. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for an alarm system. Also recommend you purchasing the 24/7 monitoring service. It gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: LaTasha

customer_reviews.title: Great company, nice security products
customer_reviews.text: Ring is a great company. The professional monitoring is very good service. They call me within 30 seconds after my alarm was triggered by mistake at 11pm. Professional and efficient. The whole system is very easy to setup,
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Everyone get a ring!
customer_reviews.text: If you were every debating on buying the ring system just do it! Simple and easy installation that you can place anywhere and anyway you please. Must have for home security that will meet everyone’s needs. Have had no weird experiences with “hackers” ect.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I don’t expect anything less from ring :). We have all their products.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app, extremely easy to set up. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 8 piece kit, and added a few extra sensors, and the entire order was received in less than 24 hours. I unboxed it and had the entire home set up before 5pm. It is so simple to use, also setup is a breeze. You can always add different sensors, camera's at a later date so really try and buy what you think you might need and add items later. I have a 3 br 2 car garage home that is completely safe now.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Affordable DIY security system
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was easy to install. I prefer self-monitoring and this was just the perfect buy for me. I wish the siren would be louder but I bought two dome sirens extra for my 3-story house and problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gymnopoulos

product_meta.title: All-new Ring Alarm 8-piece kit (2nd Gen) – home security system with optional 24/7 professional monitoring – Works with Alexa
feature_bullets: A great fit for 1-2 bedroom homes, this kit includes one base station, one keypad, four contact sensors, one motion detector, and one range extender.
Put whole-home security at your fingertips with Ring Alarm, a do-it-yourself alarm system with optional 24/7 professional monitoring for $10/month.

Voted #1 for Customer Satisfaction with DIY Home Security Systems by JD Power, this award-winning system now includes a more intuitive keypad with emergency buttons and smaller contact sensors to seamlessly blend into your home.
Receive mobile notifications when your system is triggered, change your Alarm modes, and monitor all your Ring devices all through the Ring app.
Choose the Ring Alarm kit that fits your needs and add additional components and accessories at any time.
Easily setup your Ring Alarm by plugging in your base station, connecting to wifi via the Ring app, and placing your sensors in their ideal locations.
Arm and disarm your Ring Alarm security system with your voice and receive Smart Alerts with Alexa Guard when paired with select Alexa-enabled devices.
